dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: “It sure is crowded here.”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I thought as I walked through the surprisingly crowded road leading to my school.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: “Urgh. This tattoo won’t go away...”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I noticed it before, but it seems that this tattoo has been stuck on my hand ever since that old hag cursed me.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: “I don’t really have time to worry about it not with the new school year just starting.”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: The walk to school was mostly uneventful. It is a short walk since the dorms are built quite close to the campus.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: “What a boring school...”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I muttered as the building came into view.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: The school looked rather generic with grey walls, a brown gate, a few trees, just like right out of an anime.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: If that anime was a boring slice-of-life with no budget.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I turned the corner leading into the gate and as I do I see a large sign reading, “Welcome to Bizarre Academy!” Hmm? Bizarre Academy? Must be a foreign name or something.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: My eyes turned the school entrance and as they do I see a bunch of people wearing long purple robes that have hoods.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Honestly it makes me a little bit uneasy that I can't see their face. I just won't make eye contact!

dialogue.name: Hooded man
dialogue.dialogueText: “Excuse me young man, would you think about joining the occult club?”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Crap is he talking to me? There isn't anybody else here so he must be talking to me!

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: “N-no thanks...”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I wave my hand in hopes of making it clear I’m not interested.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Unfortunately he had other plans and he grabs my hand! His nails feel sharp...almost like a claw? He’s wearing gloves so I can’t tell, but something is wrong with this guy’s hands!

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: “Uh...dude could you let go?”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: “But sir! Please consider joining the occult club. We have a clubroom and cookies! You humans love cookies!”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Us Humans? Has he lost it!? I don’t care I need to get away!

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: “Hey you better let go! I-I know karate!”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: ...I obviously don't know jack about Karate, but hopefully this will make him let go without getting violent!

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I held my hand out, but upon seeing the back of it he grew shocked. I looked down and it was the tattoo that seemed to catch his attention. The Hooded man turns to his friends and they begin to whisper before running off.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: “U-uh yeah...you go...I guess?”

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: What a weird place this school is...I hope not everybody is that crazy!

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I thought as I made my way into the school building in hopes of finding the faculty office.
